>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/data-links"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new data-link in a user context. Append `?workspaceId=` to create the data-link in a workspace context.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workspaceId","in":"query","description":"Workspace numeric identifier","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Data-link creation request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["bucket"],"title":"DataLinkType"},"provider":{"type":"string","enum":["aws","google","azure","azure_entra","seqeracompute"],"x-speakeasy-name-override":"providerType","title":"DataLinkProvider"},"resourceRef":{"type":"string"},"publicAccessible":{"type":"boolean"},"credentialsId":{"type":"string"}},"required":["credentialsId","description","name","provider","publicAccessible","resourceRef","type"],"title":"DataLinkCreateRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
